text:
Hello everybody! :wave: :wave:
Is it possible to generate PDF documents for download in HubSpot based on what client has chosen on the website?
For example, he has few options to choose from and picks two and then two of these options appear in a downloadable .PDF
What do you think? :slightly_smiling_face:

assuming that the content selected is HUBDB driven and the resulting PDF can be templated using the same, I would say yes.. if you want the PDF to be downloadable you will need a way to template the look and feel based on the selection. a tool like <http://PDFmonkey.io|PDFmonkey.io> could do this (using the hubDB API). that PDF can either be uploaded into files and shared as a link(in email) or provided as a return URL directly from PDFmonkey. it requires integration, but certainly doable.

Hello everybody!!!
is it possible to measure time between first and the second activity inside a deal? I don't know where are these properties or capabilities. Thanks in advance
